events.message: We have received the candidate's application for the Software Engineer position, including their resume and cover letter.
The application was reviewed and properly categorised under Engineering related roles due to the candidate's development experience.
A recruiter specializing in engineering hires has been assigned to manage the candidate's application process moving forward.
The recruiter conducted an initial screening call with the candidate to assess their suitability for the software development role.
The candidate responded promptly and expressed strong interest in proceeding to the next stage of the technical interview.
We have scheduled the candidate's technical interview with our senior developers to evaluate coding skills and problem-solving abilities.
The candidate successfully completed the technical interview and demonstrated strong knowledge in software engineering practices.
An HR interview has been scheduled to further discuss the candidate's fit within company culture and confirm employment details.
The HR interview was completed successfully, with the candidate showing great enthusiasm and alignment with the team environment.
An official job offer has been proposed to the candidate, including salary details, benefits, and start date.
The candidate provided positive feedback regarding the offer and expressed excitement about joining the software engineering team.
The candidate formally accepted the job offer and confirmed their commitment to start on the agreed-upon date.
New hire onboarding activities have commenced to integrate the candidate smoothly into the engineering team.
The hiring process is now officially closed with the candidate successfully joining the company as a software engineer.
